::CyberShark::

    He had enough. Battera was in trouble, he needed to hel=
p her. He reached over to Vulois and yanked the cable out of his head. He u=
sed his scanner again on them both, and hoped they would wake up all right.=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 27, 2000 7:13 AM
  Subject: NightMar=
es


  ::Battera::

  Her body jerked back as she dreamed. She fell back an=
d layed on the 
  cave floor instead of sitting as she was earlier.  She al=
most tore 
  the connection cable out from her head, but didn't.

  She cri=
ed and looked at the demonic version of Vulois.  He was 
  holding her up i=
n the air by her throat. He laughed evilly,"If you 
  think that this is pa=
in, you haven't experienced what real pain is 
  yet." He slammed her down =
onto the ground and continued to kick her 
  in the stomach and ribs.  Then=
 he walked away.  He walked over to a 
  small cabinet.  He pulled out a sm=
all remote and then walked back to 
  her.  He pushes a button on the remot=
e and a huge tank of water 
  appeared infront of them. It had glass walls,=
 she could see the water 
  inside the tank.  She wondered if he was going =
to try to drown her.  
  He pushed another button and 7 sharkticons appeare=
d in the tank. Her 
  widened in fear at the site of the sharkticons swimin=
g around inside 
  the tank.  She slowly, on her hands and knees, moved awa=
y from the 
  tank. But her leash only let her move a few feet back.
  Vulo=
is laughed and smiled at the tank. "Just as you let me to die at 
  the han=
ds of Hell Beast, it's your turn to die."  He turned and 
  walked over to =
her.  She was shaking from the damage that was already 
  done to her.  Her=
 wings were all torn and ragged, her back was marked 
  and leaking from th=
e whipping.  Her body was bruised and her ribs 
  were cracked.  She cringe=
d as he approached her.  He crabbed her by 
  the collar and lifted her fee=
t off the ground. "Now my sweet Battera, 
  you will become Sharkticon fodd=
er. And I shall enjoy watching them 
  feast on your worthless, cowardly bo=
dy."  He walked over to the 
  tank.  Still holding her by the collar, he w=
alked up the flight of 
  stairs that led to the top of the tank.  He held =
her over the water 
  as the sharkticons circled the water, just a few feet=
 below. She 
  cried and begged him not to do this, "Please,  Vulois, can't=
 you find 
  it in your spark to forgive me? You did once, please...please.=
..don't 
  let me die. I served under you as an ambassador for your ammbass=
y to 
  bring about peace. How can you do this now, killing me like this?" =
If 
  she was going to die, she wanted to know why.
  He laughed and grinne=
d evilly. "I have enjoyed watching you squirm 
  like a worm on a hook. Tha=
t is what you are, a worm. You left me to 
  die. For that, you shall die a=
s well."
  She pleaded, "Please,.....I beg you, don't put me drop me in the=
 
  tank. Please." tears were running down her cheeks and she begged for 
 =
 her life.
  He smiled,"Alright, I won't drop you into the tank."  He start=
ed to 
  pull his arm back in. Then he spun and threw her into the tank.  S=
he 
  hit the water with a loud splash.  Vulois laughed maniacally.  "See? =

  I didn't drop you, I threw you. HAHAHAAHHAA!"  She sputtered and 
  spla=
shed around on the surface of the water.  The large dorsal fins 
  of the s=
harkticons circling around her.  She twisted around, trying 
  to keep an e=
ye on them as they swamm around her, but there were too 
  many of them.
  =
Vulois walked back down the stairs and watched the scene from below 
  the =
waters surface on the outside of the tank.  He looked up and 
  could see h=
er legs kicking in the water. He laughed and waited for 
  the sharkicons t=
o start thier attack. 
  She screamed out from the tank,"HELP ME! SOMEONE H=
ELP ME!"

  She muttered in her sleep,barely audiable,"help me."
  Her arms=
 moved and her head jerked back and forth. 


        eGroups Sponsor 
    =
